elements.name: User should be able to verify the product arranged in alphabetical order

steps.name: I am on homepage
I mouse hover and click on Desktops tab
I pass selectMenu method name "Show AllDesktops"
I select sort by position "Name (Z - A)"
I should be able to verify that the product is arranged in descending order

elements.name: User should be able to verify that product is added to shopping cart successfully

steps.name: I am on homepage
I mouse hover and click on Desktops tab
I pass selectMenu method name "Show AllDesktops"
I select sort by position "Name (A - Z)"
I click on product "HP LP3065"
I verify the text "HP LP3065"
I Select Delivery Date "2022-11-30"
I enter qty "1"
I click on “Add to Cart” button
I verify the message "Success: You have added HP LP3065 to your shopping cart!"

arguments.val: Success: You have added HP LP3065 to your shopping cart!

steps.name: I click on link "shopping cart"
I Verify the shopping cart with below values

elements.name: User should be able to verify products price display high to low successfully

steps.name: I am on homepage
I mouse hover and click on Laptops & Notebooks tab
I click on "Show All Laptops & Notebooks"
I select sort by "Price (High > Low)"
I should be able to verify that the product is arranged in High to Low order

elements.name: User should be able to verify that user place order successfully

steps.name: I am on homepage
I mouse hover and click on Laptops & Notebooks tab
I click on "Show All Laptops & Notebooks"
I select sort by "Price (High > Low)"
I Select Product "MacBook"
I verify the productText "MacBook"
I click on "Add To Cart" button on MacBook page
I verify the MacBook message "Success: You have added MacBook to your shopping cart!"

arguments.val: Success: You have added MacBook to your shopping cart!

steps.name: I click on link “shopping cart” display on MacBook page
I verify the text "Shopping Cart" from MacBook page
I verify the text "MacBook" product name
I change the quantity "2"
I click on "Update" tab
I verify the message "Success: You have modified your shopping cart!" on MacBook page

arguments.val: Success: You have modified your shopping cart!

steps.name: I verify the Total £737.45
I click on "Checkout" button on MACBook page
I verify the text "checkout" on MacBook page shopping cart
I verify the text "New Customer" on MacBook page
I click on "Guest Checkout" radio button
I click on "Continue" tab on MacBook page
I enter below details in the form
I click on "Continue" Button on checkout page
I add comments about your order into text area
I check the Terms & Conditions check box
I click on continue
I verify the message "Warning: Payment method required!" on checkout page

name: Laptops and notebooks page

elements.name: User should be able to login and logout successfully

I enter the below details in the form
I click on Login button
I verify text "My Account"
I pass selectMyAccountOptions method parameter "Logout" on my account page
I verify text "Account Logout" from homepage
I click on continue button on homepage

name: Login functionality

elements.name: User should be able to navigate to register page successfully

steps.name: I am on homepage
I pass selectMyAccountOptions method parameter "Register"
I enter email id
I enter below details in the registration form
I select subscribe yes radio button
I Click on Privacy Policy check box
I Click on Continue button on register account page
I Verify the message "Your Account Has Been Created!"
I click on Continue tab
I pass selectMyAccountOptions method parameter "Logout" on registration page
I verify the text "Account Logout" on registration page
I click on Continue button
